import Mathlib
import Aesop

set_option maxHeartbeats 0
open BigOperators Real Nat Topology Rat Filter
theorem sequential_characterization_of_limit
    {X Y : Type*} [TopologicalSpace X] [FirstCountableTopology X] [TopologicalSpace Y]
    {f : X → Y} {D_f : Set X} {hat_u : X} {hat_v : Y}
    (_h_hat_u_in_closure : hat_u ∈ closure D_f) :
    (Tendsto f (𝓝[D_f] hat_u) (𝓝 hat_v)) ↔
    (∀ u : ℕ → X, (∀ n, u n ∈ D_f) → Tendsto u atTop (𝓝 hat_u) → Tendsto (f ∘ u) atTop (𝓝 hat_v)) := by sorry

proof_steps.natural_language:
We assume:
• $\lim_{u\to \widehat u}f(u)=\widehat v$ [def_1].
Therefore, we conclude:
• For any $\epsilon > 0$, there exists a $\delta > 0$ such that for any $u \in D_f$, if $\rho(u, \widehat{u}) < \delta$, then $\sigma(f(u), \widehat{v}) < \epsilon$ [l1].
proof_steps.lean_tactics:
· intro h_tendsto
  intros u h_u_in_D h_u_tends_hat_u
  exact h_tendsto.comp (tendsto_nhdsWithin_of_tendsto_nhds_of_eventually_within h_u_tends_hat_u (Filter.eventually_of_forall h_u_in_D))

• There exists an $\epsilon_0 > 0$ such that for all $\delta > 0$, there exists a $u \in D_f$ s.t. $\rho(u, \widehat{u}) < \delta$ and $\sigma(f(u), \widehat{v}) \ge \epsilon_0$ [l4].
Therefore, we conclude:
• There exists a sequence $\{u_n\}$ in $D_f$ and an $\epsilon_0 > 0$ such that for all integers $n \ge 1$, we have $\rho(u_n, \widehat{u}) < 1/n$ and $\sigma(f(u_n), \widehat{v}) \ge \epsilon_0$ [l5].

proof_steps.natural_language:
We assume:
• The assumption that '$\lim_{u\to \widehat u}f(u)=\widehat v$' is false [def_3] implies that there exists a sequence $\{u_n\}$ in $D_f$ such that $\lim_{n\to\infty}u_n=\widehat u$ but $\lim_{n\to\infty}f(u_n) \neq \widehat v$ [l8].
Therefore, we conclude:
• If for every sequence $\{u_n\}$ in $D_f$ such that $\lim_{n\to\infty}u_n=\widehat u$, we have $\lim_{n\to\infty}f(u_n)=\widehat v$, then $\lim_{u\to \widehat u}f(u)=\widehat v$ [ts_2].

import Mathlib
import Aesop

set_option maxHeartbeats 0
open BigOperators Real Nat Topology Rat Filter
theorem sequential_characterization_of_limit
    {X Y : Type*} [TopologicalSpace X] [FirstCountableTopology X] [TopologicalSpace Y]
    {f : X → Y} {D_f : Set X} {hat_u : X} {hat_v : Y}
    (_h_hat_u_in_closure : hat_u ∈ closure D_f) :
    (Tendsto f (𝓝[D_f] hat_u) (𝓝 hat_v)) ↔
    (∀ u : ℕ → X, (∀ n, u n ∈ D_f) → Tendsto u atTop (𝓝 hat_u) → Tendsto (f ∘ u) atTop (𝓝 hat_v)) := by
· intro h_tendsto
  intros u h_u_in_D h_u_tends_hat_u
  exact h_tendsto.comp (tendsto_nhdsWithin_of_tendsto_nhds_of_eventually_within h_u_tends_hat_u (Filter.eventually_of_forall h_u_in_D))
